DOC.criteria: Caucasic men woman Age 1865 year Body mass index less equal 30 Kg/m2 Arterial hypertension History clinical sign heart , brain , lung , kidney , malignant endocrine organ disease . Abnormal biochemical screening blood regarding : red white cell count , Bhemoglobin , Psodium , Ppotassium , Pcreatinine , Palbumine , P bilirubin , Palanine aminotransferase , P alkaline phosphatase , pcholesterol Bglucose . Abnormal screen urine regarding : blood , albumine glucose .
